revised_title: Kathleen Lonsdale: A Pioneering Crystallographer and Her Life
tldr: This article is a biography of Kathleen Lonsdale, a pioneering crystallographer who made significant contributions to the field of crystal structure determination using X-ray diffraction. It highlights her early life, education, and career, including her work with W. H. Bragg and her move to Leeds where she continued her research in crystallography.
